text.enterusername: Enter Your Username or BTC Wallet Address
text.enter_current_username: Enter Your Current or Desired Username
text.redirect_login_instructions: Enter your main wallet address or an existing or desired username
text.redirect_login_description:
If you are already registered, this will take you to the game.

If you don't have an account yet, this will start the quick registration process.
text.anonymous_mode_description:
Enter your main bitcoin wallet address to start playing anonymously right away.

Your winnings will be sent to this wallet.
text.socket_browser:
Having problems connecting to BetCoin?

The current session is disconnected from the server. Please refresh this page to get reconnected.

Make sure you are using one of the supported browsers below

Chrome / Firefox
text.server_unreachable:
It looks like you were not able to connect to our server, please refresh the page and see if it works.

If the problem persists, please contact our support team.
text.browser_no_supported: We don't support stock android or opera browsers at the moment, please try using the other browsers, such as Chrome, Firefox
